descriptions.combat.antibot: Removes the bots created by the matrix.
descriptions.combat.autoanchor: Automatically places and explodes respawn anchors.
descriptions.combat.autobuff: Automatically throws potions with effects under you.
descriptions.combat.autototem: Automatically places totem and other items in your offhand.
descriptions.combat.autoweb: Puts a web at the target's feet
descriptions.combat.blocker: Protect your surround from cev, civ, and others.
descriptions.combat.burrow: Puts a block/web/skull into your thighs.
descriptions.combat.cevbreaker: Mines blocks above player head and explodes crystals.
descriptions.combat.hitboxes: Allows you to increase the hitboxes of entities.
descriptions.combat.pistonaura: Pushes crystals in player HitBox using pistons.
descriptions.combat.pistonpush: Pushes players from safe holes using pistons.
descriptions.combat.surround: Surrounds your legs using specified blocks.
descriptions.combat.triggerbot: Attacks the entity in the crosshairs.
descriptions.thunderhack.media: Hides nicknames and skins of other players.
descriptions.thunderhack.optifinecapes: Allows to use Optifine capes without optifine.
